articles.title: About me
articles.contents:
I was born and rised in Bogotá-Colombian which is a
city with ~10 million of inhabitants placed at 3200 masl. I studied
Microbiology in the
Pontificia
Universidad Javeriana

            Welcome!!
            Hi my name is Johan Sebastián Sáenz and
            I am a microbial ecologist currently working in the
            Department
            of Functional Microbiology of Livestock at the Hohenheim
            University.
            I am interested in the main drivers of microbial
            community structure and function, with special focus on the
            phage´s role.
            
            This is my personal site please look around and contact
            me!!

articles.title: Publications
articles.contents:
Here you can find some selected publications but if you are
interested in the full list, you can browse around in
Google
Scholar

Hwang, Y., Schulze-Makuch, D., Arens, F. L., Saenz, J.
S., Adam, P. S., Sager, C., … & Probst, A. J. (2021).
Leave no stone unturned: individually adapted xerotolerant
Thaumarchaeota sheltered below the boulders of the Atacama Desert
hyperarid core. Microbiome, 9(1), 1-17.
Tröscher-Mußotter, J., Saenz, J. S., Grindler,
S., Meyer, J., Kononov, S. U., Mezger, B., … & Seifert, J. (2021).
Microbiome Clusters Disclose Physiologic Variances in Dairy Cows
Challenged by Calving and Lipopolysaccharides. Msystems, 6(5),
e00856-21.
Sáenz, J. S., Marques, T. V., Barone, R. S. C.,
Cyrino, J. E. P., Kublik, S., Nesme, J., … & Vestergaard, G. (2019).
Oral administration of antibiotics increased the potential
mobility of bacterial resistance genes in the gut of the fish Piaractus
mesopotamicus. Microbiome, 7(1), 1-14.
Sáenz, J. S.1, Roldan, F., Junca, H., &
Arbeli, Z. (2019). Effect of the extraction and purification of
soil DNA and pooling of PCR amplification products on the description of
bacterial and archaeal communities. Journal of Applied
Microbiology, 126(5), 1454-1467.
Schulze-Makuch, D., Wagner, D., Kounaves, S. P., Mangelsdorf, K.,
Devine, K. G., de Vera, J. P., Saenz, J. S., … &
Zamorano, P. (2018). Transitory microbial habitat in the
hyperarid Atacama Desert. Proceedings of the National Academy
of Sciences, 115(11), 2670-2675.

Johan Sebastián Sáenz
This is my personal website made with:
R
Distill
